adrFormatAddress: 250 Park Ave suite 1901, New York, NY 10177, USA

originalText.text: I've thoroughly enjoyed my experience with RA Cohen. My building is clean and maintained and both RA Cohen and my super are readily available. I'm coming up on my lease renewal and I couldn't be more pleased with my experience. Fred, in particular, is a joy to work with and I know I'll be taken care of. No place is without its faults, but given how expensive and horribly ran so many NY apartments are nowadays, there's little to complain about. Even if I choose to move, I plan on using RA Cohen for all future apartments. It's been a pleasure! Thanks Fred!

originalText.text: I live in a R.A. Cohen building in Manhattan. I have nothing but great things to say about my experience. The Super is amazing and management is very responsive.

text.text: I live in a R.A. Cohen building in Manhattan. I have nothing but great things to say about my experience. The Super is amazing and management is very responsive.

originalText.text:
RA Cohen is easy to communicate with, professional, and responsive.  I took a studio in April 2021. The building is a well-kept, walk-up, typical old19th century tenement type. The apartment was delivered renovated, freshly painted & clean - a good value for the quality.  I  have been surprisingly happy with decision having moved from a too-expensive luxury doorman rental in FIDI - do not miss it a bit.

Regarding service, I emailed RA Cohen recently about a faltering refrigerator and they immediately had a professional come in and repair. Otherwise the super is available by mobile/text, friendly and helpful.  He put in my AC Unit.  The building is clean, the tenants are likable and pleasant. So far recomended.

originalText.text: We have had a great experience working with RA Cohen and Associates and have thoroughly enjoyed living in a building that they manage.

text.text: We have had a great experience working with RA Cohen and Associates and have thoroughly enjoyed living in a building that they manage.

originalText.text: I have been renting from RA Cohen in Westchester for almost 9 years. The building that I live in is lovely and historic. Fred and Kevin at the management office are very responsive and I want to give a special shout out to our onsite Super. He is terrific - he really cares about his work and keeping the building in great shape. My kids and I have been very happy here.
